bookSourceName: (搜索需输验证码)兰兰文学网

ruleSearch.author: .s4@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var scriptContent = String(java.getElement('body > script:nth-child(13)'));
if (scriptContent.includes("请输入验证码")) {
  java.longToast("验证码错误，请重新输入");
  var imgurl = java.get("imgurl");
  var url = java.get("url");
  var verify = java.getVerificationCode(imgurl);
  url = String(url).replace(/captcha=.+$/, `captcha=${verify}`);
  var result = java.ajax(url);
  while (String(result).includes("请输入验证码")) {
    java.longToast("验证码错误，请重新输入");
    verify = java.getVerificationCode(imgurl);
    url = String(url).replace(/captcha=.+$/, `captcha=${verify}`);
    result = java.ajax(url);
  }
} else {
  var result = result;
}
  result;
</js>
